params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which the reward token is added
params.timestamp: Timestamp at which the reward token was pushed
params.token: Address of the token being pushed

params.amount: Amount of tokens added to the gauge
params.exchangeRate: New exchange rate for this `token` in this `gauge`
params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which the rewards are added
params.token: Address of the token being added

params.exchangeRate: Exchange rate at which the rewards were claimed
params.gauge: Address of the gauge for which the user claimed rewards
params.token: Address of the token for which the user claimed rewards
params.user: Address of the user who claimed rewards

params.gauge: Address of the gauge to decrease stake for
params.oldStakeBalance: Old stake balance of the user
params.user: Address of the user to decrease stake for

params.gauge: Address of the gauge to increase stake for
params.oldStakeBalance: Old stake balance of the user
params.user: Address of the user to increase stake for

afterSwap(address,address,uint256,addres.details: Called by the liquidation contract anytime tokens are liquidated.Will push token to the `gaugeRewardTokens` mapping if different from the current one.

params.ticket: The address of the tickets that were sold
params.token: The address of the token that the tickets were sold for
params.tokenAmount: The amount of tokens that the tickets were sold for

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to claim rewards for
params._token: Address of the token to claim rewards for
params._user: Address of the user to claim rewards for

params._gauge: Address of the gauge to get current reward token for

returns._0: Current reward token for the given gauge

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

Deployed(address,address,address,uint32).notice: Emitted when the contract is deployed

RewardTokenPushed(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when a new reward token is pushed onto the `gaugeRewardTokens` mapping

RewardsAdded(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when rewards token are added to a gauge

RewardsClaimed(address,address,address,u.notice: Emitted when a user claimed their rewards for a given gauge and token

afterDecreaseGauge(address,address,uint2.notice: Fallback function to call in GaugeController after a user has decreased his gauge stake.

afterIncreaseGauge(address,address,uint2.notice: Fallback function to call in GaugeController after a user has increased their gauge stake.

afterSwap(address,address,uint256,addres.notice: Add rewards denominated in `token` for the given `gauge`.

claim(address,address,address).notice: Claim user rewards for a given gauge and token.

currentRewardToken(address).notice: Return the current reward token for the given gauge.

liquidator().notice: Address of the liquidator that this contract is listening to

stakerCut().notice: Percentage of rewards that goes to stakers. Fixed point 9 number this is less than 1.

userTokenGaugeExchangeRates(address,addr.notice: Tracks user token gauge exchange rate

userdoc.notice: The GaugeReward contract handles the rewards for users who staked in one or several gauges on the GaugeController contract.
